pullRequest.title: Add base argument class for conditionally reading objects.
pullRequest.bodyText:
GetObject, HeadObject and CopyObject S3 API support conditions
on reading objects. This patch introduces common base class
ObjectConditionalReadArgs for GetObjectArgs, StatObjectArgs,
CopySource and ComposeSource to avoid code duplication.

beforeCommit.message:
Add base argument class for conditionally reading objects.

`GetObject`, `HeadObject` and `CopyObject` S3 API support conditions
on reading objects. This patch introduces common base class
`ObjectConditionalReadArgs` for `GetObjectArgs`, `StatObjectArgs`,
`CopySource` and `ComposeSource` to avoid code duplication.

nodes.bodyText: As the name suggest  StatObjectArgs is an builder type then why is the constructor used. IMO it should be renamed to StatObject similar to ComposeObject.

Suggested change
